name: Anxiety Support
description: A community to support those dealing with anxiety by sharing experiences and coping mechanisms.

name: Depression Support
description: A space for those dealing with depression to come together and find mutual understanding and encouragement.

name: Stress Management
description: Join this group to learn how to better manage stress and find balance in your daily life.

name: Grief Support
description: A safe space for people to share their experiences and emotions after losing loved ones.
